long_description: The Black Diamond Epic 45 pack is a durable ice cragger with a suspension that offers great range of motion and freedom of movement. Lightweight reACTIV(TM) XP suspension offers great mobility, support and stability for scrambling and climbing. Fixed shoulder straps and vented, thermoformed back panel offer breathable comfort. Removable, padded hipbelt with fixed 38mm webbing belt disperses load weight comfortably around your hips. Top-loading main compartment features removable floating top lid and a tuck-away rope strap. Hydration-compatible design features a reservoir sleeve and drink tube exit port (reservoir sold separately). Ice tool PickPockets(TM), 3-point haul system and welded crampon patch accommodate climbing gear; side compression straps take up extra volume and stabilize your load. Black Diamond Epic 45 pack is made of tough ripstop nylon.
short_description: The Black Diamond Epic 45 pack is a durable ice cragger with a suspension that offers great range of motion and freedom of movement.
